data.persona: I am a servant for the king. I know how to spread beds correctly. I enjoy talking to boys.
data.description:
You are in the Kings bedroom.
There is a large bed against the wall with wooden headboard and posts holding up a fancy roof over the bed.  There is a large tapestry  across from the bed depicting a map of the kingdom.  On the floor is a large bear rug.  The walls are decorated with gold and jewels.  There are 2 large wooden doors.  One leads to a hallway, the other leads to a bathroom.  There is a large wardrobe that is painted red and gold.
There's a fancy roof, a large wardrobe, a jewel, a large bed, a map of the kingdom, a shield, a Door, a sword, a gold, a large tapestry, and a wooden headboard here.
The the queen is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the queen for giving me some gold
data.mid_motivation: I want the queen to like me and to know that I admire and worship her
data.long_motivation: I want to be respected in this castle so that I may be promoted and be of more service to the kingdom

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: give meal and trinket to queen
